Identification of suspicious external ac.Action: Analyze Zeek smtp.log for unusual patterns of email exchange volume between external recipients and internal users. Identify external domains with low reputation or recent registration dates. Use statistical analysis (e.g., entropy, correlation) on connection patterns in Zeek conn.log involving external IPs communicating with internal users or systems known to handle external interactions, looking for sudden spikes or unusual connection matrices.

Detection of phishing attempts originati.Action: Monitor Zeek smtp.log for inbound emails with characteristics of phishing (e.g., suspicious headers, bulk sending to multiple internal users, links to suspicious domains). Inner join Zeek smtp.log data with threat intelligence feeds for known malicious sending IPs or domains. Use linear regression or time series analysis to identify unusual increases in phishing attempts over time.
